channel.title: Charecters in my server get black screens alot?
channel.description:
Whats going on? Every like 20 min someone reports that when they log in, all they see is a black screen.. WTF? whats causing this? how can i fix it?
Help me and i will be willing to give you 400k rs cash. -------------------------------------------------------------------- If you can get me a tutorial on adding shops, it will be most appreciated. Paying 100k rs cash. ^^
----------------------------------------------- NEED A BANNER FOR ChocoScape!
(silver background swirled will be the best)
text: ChocoScape
Paying 3m Rs cash.

item.title: Charecters in my server get black screens alot?

item.description:

pimped, are you saying that all they have to do is restart client, and than the acc will work again?

item.title: Charecters in my server get black screens alot?
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

Try searching for frame107 that frame is usually for endding cutscenes when the screen fades to black… Maybe someone has added that to your source?
